27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Iylas bin Salamah bin Al-Akwa' narrated from his father that the Messenger of Allah said:"A man shall remain exalting himself until he is written among the tyrants, so that he suffers from their afflictions

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Arrogance
